title: 在MINECON上打印你的皮肤！
author: 混乱
txt_content:
在MINECON上打印你的皮肤  ——由Mattel &57DIGITAL提供PRINT YOUR SKIN AT MINECON THANKS TO MATTEL & 57DIGITAL

如果你要参加MINECON你可能有兴趣知道，玩具公司美泰将会提供超期酷的皮肤打印服务，这样你就可以在现实中塑造你的游戏中的脸（与游戏中的身体，腿和手臂）直到变成一个漂亮的雕像！
If you’re going to MINECON you may be interested to know that toy-wizards Mattel are offering a supercool skin-printing service, so you can slap your game-face (and game-body, game-legs and game-arms) onto a nifty figurine!

这太酷了！美泰公司会打印基于你在游戏中的皮肤的贴纸（或独家即将要被透露MINECON 2016年的设计之一！），然后你把它粘到塑料模型上。在MINECON美泰展台，购买你的个人模型（$ 15.00 +税），在展台上现场打印贴纸，你就会有你自己的迷你MC小人，准备创建，探索和生存的广阔景观您的书架或桌面！It’s seriously cool. You craft the look of your unique figure by using an actual skin from the game. Mattel creates and prints a custom label based on your in-game skin (or one of the exclusive soon-to-be-revealed MINECON 2016 designs!), and then you stick it onto the figure. Just come to the Mattel booth at MINECON, purchase your Survival Mode Player One Figure ($15.00 + tax), print your label at the booth and you’ll have your very own mini-minecrafter, ready to create, explore and survive the sprawling landscape of your shelf or desk!
这玩意超棒，如果你可以在你排队之前提前准备好， - 它会加速大家的排队进程。<3It’d be super nice if you could have a design ready before you hit the queue - it’d speed things along for everyone. <3

如果你不希望使用在游戏中的皮肤，你可以打印你自己画的自定义外观：美泰公司已经联软件天才“57digital”，Mojang认可的皮肤工作室，一个强大的皮肤编辑手机APP。只要应用了这个手机APP，如果你有很多彩笔和纸之类的，你也可以现场设计一个皮肤，使用57digital的皮肤扫描 ——扫描你的涂鸦，让他变成像素方块的标准皮肤格式。If you don’t want to use your in-game skin, you can print a custom skin you’ve designed yourself: Mattel have teamed up with app-making geniuses 57digital, who make the Mojang-approved Skin Studio, a powerful and slick skin editing tool for your phone. Just work up a design in the app, and Mattel will sort out the rest when you hit the front of the queue at MINECON. If you’re more of a pen and paper sort, you can also design a skin with 57digital’s Skin Scanner - print out a skin template, colour in the squares as you please and the app will scan it in and turn it into pixels.
只要确保你的设计是标准的人体模板。（头盔和铠甲层覆盖的皮肤将无法打印,Soz）。获取像素大甩卖！Just make sure you keep your designs to the standard human body template. (Helmets and other overlay objects in the armour layer won’t print. Soz.)Get pixel-pushin’!Cheerio！Marsh - @marshdavies


消息来自MOJANG官网：http://mojang.com/2016/09/print- ... ttel-and-57digital/
